Apple_Apple_scab.description: A fungal disease affecting apple leaves and fruits.
symptoms: Olive-green or brown spots on leaves
prevention: Apply fungicides during the growing season

Apple_Black_rot.description: A fungal disease causing fruit rot and leaf spots.
treatment: Use fungicides approved for black rot

Apple_Cedar_apple_rust.description: A fungal disease spread between apple and cedar trees.

Apple_Healthy.description: The apple tree is healthy with no visible signs of disease.

Corn_Common_rust.description: A fungal disease affecting corn leaves.
treatment: Promote airflow in the crop canopy

Corn_Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: A foliar disease caused by fungal infection.
symptoms: Large, elliptical gray lesions on leaves

Corn_Healthy.description: The corn plant is healthy with no visible signs of disease.
symptoms: No signs of discoloration or lesions
prevention: Regular monitoring for pests or diseases

Grape_Black_rot.description: A fungal disease causing fruit rot and leaf damage.
treatment: Remove all infected fruits and leaves

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.description: A bacterial disease affecting tomato leaves and fruits.
symptoms: Small, dark, water-soaked spots on leaves

Tomato_Late_blight.description: A devastating fungal disease affecting tomato plants.
treatment: Remove infected plants to prevent spread

Tomato_Healthy.description: The tomato plant is healthy with no visible signs of disease.
symptoms: No signs of spots or discoloration
prevention: Regular monitoring for pests or diseases
